product_name: Oakley Swim  O-Laser Long Triangle Bikini Top - Women's
long_description: Get your splash on in the Oakley Swim O-Laser Long Triangle Bikini Top. Lace-like detail makes a stylish statement while an athletic racerback offers plenty of support for all-day play.
